Author: filippounits
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: Is now possible to try the alpha version of Lescovex DEX, a tool for managing your ethers and ethereum tokens, with the possibility of issuing financial contracts and trading them directly on a decentralized OTC market. https://github.com/Lescovex/LSCX  Features list:  - Import & export accounts - Ether, send rececive, history - Tokens, send receive, history, add - Create Smart contracts, crypto currencies, commodoties, securities - Buy & Sell assets  Cooming Soon features:  - Publish tokens in the global market - Token Holdes Sweeper - Blockchain Certification Authority - X509 Signatures - Smart Forward Contracts   Comments, bug reports, advise and new feature requests are welcome!

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: Lescovex launches a platform for the issuance of smart contracts and exchange criptoassests with the largest number of fiat currencies: https://bitcoingarden.org/lescovex-launches-a-platform-for-the-issuance-of-smart-contracts-and-exchange-criptoassests-with-the-larg...  This week Lescovex.com has launched its platform for issuing smart contracts and exchanging cryptocurrencies that combines the largest number of fiat pairs in the blockchain ecosystem.  The sector of cryptocurrencies and the application of the blockchain in the field of the technological industry, is here to stay. An example of this is the increase in the number of ideas, projects and companies related to this technology that have emerged in recent years.  In addition to cryptocurrencies, there are all types of cryptoassets that are distributed worldwide through ICOs, exchanges and all types of airdrops. The world seems to be finally tokenized, and in Lescovex they have already designed a platform capable of adapting to this transition....

Author: filippounits
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: LESCOVEX MEETING IN HONG KONG  Lescovex team will be attending "Simplify the tokenizing of goods and digital assets thru Smart Contracts" in Hong Kong. There will be a presentation of the project and all news will be shared to the attendants. The event is It is a good opportunity to make the project known to HK Entrepreneurs, Start-ups & BlockChain Lovers Community. LESCOVEX is a platform for the exchange and creation of digital assets. A tool that, through Ethereum's smart contracts technology, simplifies the process of tokenizing any good or digital asset. At the same time, the platform offers an online market where all kinds of digital goods can be exchanged: Cryptocurrencies, Tokens and Commodities, offering the possibility of trading them with the main fiat currencies such as EUR, USD, JPY, CNY and MXN.  The main goal of the platform is to simplify the process of creation of tokens and smart contracts to facilitate the adoption of this potential technology in the organization and business of SMEs.  With the aim of creating the largest new generation exchange supported by a solid community, Lescovex will distribute its profits among the entire community that supports the exchange by acquiring the official token of the platform [LCX]. Therefore, investors who have LCX tokens will receive 50% of the commissions of all the trading volume generated in the exchange.  If you are interested in attending, we encourage you to sign up in the following link: https://www.meetup.com/hkentrepreneur/events/248985200/  When: Wednesday, April 4, 2018 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM  Where: Wework Tower CWB Wework Tower 535 535 Jaffe Road, Causeway Bay · Hong Kong Island  Website: https://lescovex.com/ Discord: https://discord.gg/Mux55Pc Twitter: https://twitter.com/lescovex Telegram: https://t.me/lescovex

Author: Ridjal
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: LESCOVEX COIN LISTING PROCESS HAS STARTED!   At Lescovex, we have started our coin listing process. Through a voting system published in our website www.lescovex.com, we ask users to participate by suggesting their favorite coins or tokens so we can see which ones have the most support from the community.  The fact that a coin or a token obtains a higher number of votes does not mean we will list it for sure. We also check the quality of the project, its philosophy, and the technical aspects. In short, we're doing a due diligence process with every token before listing them.  Lescovex team has started considering the first coins to list on our exchange and after an accurate research, three coins have been selected this week:  Bytecoin (BTC) Paccoin (PAC) Experience Points (XP)  We'll be announcing more coins during the next days so, keep supporting your coin and encourage its community to vote and comment.  Thanks to all voters!

Author: oprz
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: https://cryptorated.com/ico-listing/lescovex/   LESCOVEX pre-sale starts in 7 days  The distribution of the Lescovex tokens [LCX] will be made in 78 days, from February 12 to April 19 and will consist of two phases.  1- Pre-sale 500,000 LCX from February 12 (14:00 UTC) to February 28 (14:00 UTC).  2- ICO 4.500.000 LCX from March 1 (14:00 UTC) to April 19 (14:00 UTC). This phase will have different bonuses that will decrease as the end date of the ICO approaches.  TOKEN PRICE: 1 LCX = 0.01 ETH  Bonus  25% - February 12 14:00 UTC until March 1 14:00 UTC 20% - March 1 14:00 UTC until March 10 14:00 UTC 15% - March 10 14:00 UTC until March 20 14:00 UTC 10% - March 20 14:00 UTC until April 30 14:00 UTC 05% - March 30 14:00 UTC until April 9 14:00 UTC 00% - April 9 14:00 UTC until April 19 14:00 UTC  The LCX Tokens are ERC-20 tokens and will be issued at the same time they are purchased.  Stay tuned and be the first to get LCX tokens!  https://www.lescovex.com/token-sale  Follow Lescovex on Twitter: https://twitter.com/lescovex

Author: marc-PylonNetwork
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: I'm looking the source code of the contract and I can't see that works like exchange, is it right? How can the contract calculate the price of the token? Could someone explain me that?

Author: EntropyMarket
Title: [ANN] Lescovex Digital Assets - Issue contract from exchange
Body: if you see the contract you can see the status function that recalculates the price each time that someboy buy or sell tokens to the contract.        buyPrice=(this.balance/totalSupply);       sellPrice=buyPrice-(buyPrice*spread)/100;  you can see that the sell price have spread respect buy price, by this way the contract wins ether, and increase the balance of himself. Other way to wins ether is because 50 % of the fees of the exchang going directly to the contract.
